TEXT.TITLE: NATIONAL FSI INC <NFSI> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss six cts vs profit 19 cts Net loss 166,000 vs profit 580,000 Revs 3,772,000 vs 5,545,000 Year Shr loss 13 cts vs profit 52 cts Net loss 391,000 vs profit 1,425,000 Revs 15.4 mln vs 16.6 mln NOTE: 1985 year figures pro forma for purchase accounting adjustments resulting from March 1985 reeacquisition of company by its original shareholders before August 1985 initial public offering.
